alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued December 28 at 3:28PM HST until December 29 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... .An extra-large north-northwest 340 degrees swell combined with a large north swell 350 degrees will continue warning level surf for north and west facing shores of the smaller islands and advisory level surf for north facing shores of the Big Island. ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Surf 25 to 35 feet along north facing shores and 15 to 20 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu and Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala
